channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Quantum theory and thermodynamics: Maxwell's demon?
item.description: An international collaboration sheds new light on the relationship between quantum theory and thermodynamics. The research group demonstrated that whi...

item.title: Some species of baleen whales avoid attracting killer whales by singing too low to be heard
item.description: New research finds some baleen whale species call at such deep frequencies that they're completely undetectable by killer whales, which cannot hear so...

item.title: Temperamental stars are distorting our view of distant planets
item.description: 'Temperamental' stars that brighten and dim over a matter of hours or days may be distorting our view of thousands of distant planets, suggests a new ...

item.title: An Arctic 'beyond recognition' by 2100

item.title: Soft tissue from a 183 million-year-old Jurassic plesiosaur analyzed
